last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 13
last_episode_to_air.overview: Ekkachai offers Taycho and the chemist a deal in exchange for information on Lao-ta, but Taycho's henchman Saming outmaneuvers the police.

name: Monkey Twins
original_name: วายุเทพยุทธ์
overview: Inspired by Khon dance drama and Thai martial arts, a fighter scarred by the past joins forces with a determined cop to battle an organized crime ring.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: After intervening in a brawl, undercover cop Mawin hides with a Khon troupe and suspects a feud between one of its members and a local politico's son.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Neua's buddy Pheuak grows suspicious of Mawin and confronts him. Politician Chanchai races to stay one step ahead of the police, who raid his home.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Chanchai threatens Phong's family to secure the incriminating footage of Taycho. Neua asks Kla to resume teaching him a once-forbidden martial art.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Mawin seeks to pin down Chanchai's informant. Taycho uses his father's connections to strike at Kla through a land scheme and provoke Neua to fight.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: When Mawin and his colleagues stake out a meeting between Taycho and yakuza boss Yamato, a shootout ensues. Neua steals Kla's book after losing a fight.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Yamato forces Taycho into a risky partnership. After confronting Neua about the stolen book, Kla offers to teach Mawin the Discipline of the Monkey.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Yamato proves he has leverage with Chanchai. Mawin, Li-in and Neua confront Taycho's men during their Khon-Xiqu performance.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Chanchai scrambles to clean up Taycho's publicity debacle, but an even greater threat lies ahead. Mawin encounters the dark discipline of Rakshasa.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Mawin keeps a close eye on Taycho, who's determined to learn the discipline of Rakshasa. Yamato urges Dej to get rid of Mawin.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Dej forces Li-in's father to sell his land and demands a bigger cut from Yamato. Mawin tracks down the connection between Yamato and Lao-ta's gang.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Taycho confronts Dej after he receives a package containing video footage. With Yamato in a bind, Tamako seizes the chance for personal revenge.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Taycho uses Namtarn to force Mawin to hand over the chemist. With their loved ones' lives at stake, Mawin and Neua must fight each other.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Ekkachai offers Taycho and the chemist a deal in exchange for information on Lao-ta, but Taycho's henchman Saming outmaneuvers the police.
